channel.title: FlareSoft V2 - A 474 Semi-remake - Beta In Progress
channel.description:
[CENTER][b]FlareSoft V2[/b] [i]#474[/i] [i]Let's revolutionize RSPS[/i]
Whenever I head to a RSPS downloads section, all I can see is PI after PI after PI. We want to offer a [b]high quality[/b] server that [b][u]WILL[/u][/b] be finished. Yes this is a [b]REAL[/b] 474 not some 317 loading 474 content shit. Canownueasy is the main developer on this (I also develop but he is far more better than I am at programming) and we plan to start hosting this project as soon as possible.
The idea of this project is to bring back memories and let people once again enjoy old RuneScape as it was - in full glory. Here brings [b]FlareSoft V2[/b] [i]#474[/i].
[b]Combat Preview[/b] (Since many said I was faking when I said [b]FLAWLESS[/b] combat) [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BpkbzPBGjQw]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BpkbzPBGjQw[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xb-Q_gOKUPo]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xb-Q_gOKUPo[/url]

item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:49, topic:416790”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=518729.msg3777532#msg3777532 date=1318199039]

[quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=518729.msg3777530#msg3777530 date=1318198909]

I love this.

that’s kinda what I said lmao, i looked and it was dev section I would have said “finally a good rsps release” if this was download section.

V1 was, at one point

I got it in time b4 it was removed.
Now only the closed source v1 is available
[/quote]link or die

I’ve already edited it… and well… yeah (Not much though…) plus i promised Marc I wouldn’t release
And it would be unhealthy for the development of v2 :o
[/quote]damn you ill just have to wait and see if this gets released[/quote]
Sorry D:

item.title: FlareSoft V2 - A 474 Semi-remake - Beta In Progress
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:33, topic:416790”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=518729.msg3769668#msg3769668 date=1317568429]
I feel we can really go big with this one. We would host a beta right now but we feel there isn’t enough of an economy and not enough things to do atm. If we made it spawn, it would kinda be a pk server so idk.
[/quote]
Well do as much as needed before releasing it to the public, from what I see from the pictures, it’s the basic of RuneScape and a lot of the regular stuff I can see from RSPS’. I still believe this server would make it big though.[/quote]
It has ALOT, I’ve seen the source code (I have it too…) its actually cleanly coded, things are loaded via XML, and actually there are alot of things done, npc combat is highly detailed, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: FlareSoft V2 - A 474 Semi-remake - Beta In Progress
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

marcbob:

I feel we can really go big with this one. We would host a beta right now but we feel there isn’t enough of an economy and not enough things to do atm. If we made it spawn, it would kinda be a pk server so idk.

Well do as much as needed before releasing it to the public, from what I see from the pictures, it’s the basic of RuneScape and a lot of the regular stuff I can see from RSPS’. I still believe this server would make it big though.

Read full topic

item.title: FlareSoft V2 - A 474 Semi-remake - Beta In Progress
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

It’s only a semi-remake because Canownueasy is dedicated to getting all the npc dialogues and certain features such as the al-kharid gate costing 10gp. Otherwise we are trying to make it user friendly and have a strong economy.

Read full topic
